summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Military Patrol Tracking application completed. All 10 requested features tested and working correctly.
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - used existing patrol data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All patrol tracking features working correctly. Session persists within browser session. Trail API returns 13 points for patrol 10DIV0001 with 2.73km total distance.

test_1_login.description: Login with 10_DIV_HQ / CMS@RamuCantt credentials works correctly, redirects to /hq dashboard

test_2_tracking_stat.description: Dashboard header shows 'TRACKING: 1' indicating Capt Sakib Jaki Chowdhury is actively tracking

test_3_map_display.description: Map displays correctly with patrol markers visible on the map

test_4_patrol_list.description: Patrol list shows 229/229 patrols on right panel

test_5_patrol_fly_to.description: Clicking on Capt Sakib Jaki Chowdhury patrol flies map to location and shows popup with patrol details (ID: 10DIV0001, Area: Patiya Army Camp, Status: approved)

test_6_trails_toggle.description: Trails toggle enables/disables trail visualization. Trail line visible when enabled for selected patrol

test_7_trail_on_map.description: Selected patrol shows trail line on map when trails enabled. Trail API returns 13 points with 2.73km total distance

test_8_zoom_controls.description: Zoom controls (Zoom In, Zoom Out, Reset View) at bottom-left work correctly

test_9_map_type_toggles.description: Map type toggles (Map/Sat/Topo/Dark) at top-center change map style correctly

test_10_heat_map.description: Heat map toggle shows/hides density visualization on the map

additional_observations.session_persistence: Session persists correctly within browser session using localStorage
additional_observations.websocket_connection: WebSocket connects successfully for real-time updates (wss://tacticalmap-5.preview.emergentagent.com/ws/10_DIV_HQ)
additional_observations.kml_layers: 65 KML layer groups loaded from backend (1080 features)
additional_observations.header_stats: Header shows PRO 229/3, TOTAL 229, APPROVED 0, TRACKING 1, ALERTS 0
